messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-Discussion] How many forum users does it take to change a li...
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 7/23/2003 9:42:57 AM Eastern Daylight Time, ... I amaze even myself sometimes!  I have the power! ~Kelly [Non-text portions of this
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 7/23/2003 9:42:57 AM Eastern Daylight Time,
ddzimlew@... writes:
> I dreamed about this list last night.
> I dreamed Kelly corrected my spelling and grammar. (and someone soitanly
> should)
>
> Dylan's dad is out of town and Dylan and I have been away a lot. We've
> been hiking and camping and visiting friends. When we've been home we've
> had company and I haven't had much time to post until last weekend.
> Wow! The last few days were not the best days to try to catch up and
> participate. It must have affected my tiny little mind because I
> dreamed Kelly sent me a private e-mail telling me to proof read. <G>
>
> It's good advice, Kelly, thank you.

I amaze even myself sometimes! <g>

I have the power!

~Kelly


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
